channel.title: Tsokkos Hotels & Resorts | Hotels in Cyprus | Apartments in Cyprus | Ayia Napa Holidays | Hotel Weddings Cyprus | Accommodation in Cyprus
channel.description: Tsokkos Hotels offers a wide range of accommodation with over 30 hotels, a tourist village and apartments to choose from. From five and four star luxurious guest rooms featuring every convenience to tasteful self-catering hotel apartments set in beautiful gardens, all of which are set on central beachfront locations.
